multiplechoiceresponse.p: Redis tracks the ID of the last delivered message for each consumer group. Which of the following mechanisms is used for this?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Choose one answer

choicegroup.choice: A last-delivered-id property on the group

div.p: A property called last-delivered-id is used to track which message ID was delivered last to any consumer within a consumer group. This can be seen when using the XINFO command to get information about the consumer group.
The PEL is specific to a consumer within a group. Itâ€™s not global to a consumer group. The PEL keeps tracking of which messages have been delivered to a consumer.
